SVGScriptElement.summary: The SVGScriptElement interface corresponds to the SVG script element.

summary.blockquote:
WARNINGThe href.baseVal property represents the URL of an external script loaded into the SVG script element.
APIs like this are known as injection sinks, and are potentially a vector for cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.

remarks.para:
You can mitigate this risk by having a Content Security Policy (CSP) that restricts the locations from which scripts can be loaded, and by always assigning objects instead of strings, and enforcing trusted types.
See Security considerations for more information.
The href read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("href")}} or {{SVGAttr("xlink:href")}} {{deprecated_inline}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("script")}} element.

SVGScriptElementType.summary: The type read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("type")}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("script")}} element.
